name: Joelle
physical_description: A young adult woman with light skin and an oval face, displaying feminine features and a warm smile. Her brown almond-shaped eyes are complemented by medium-length, wavy brown hair. She appears to be of average height with a slender to average build.
face_description: Oval face with feminine features, brown almond-shaped eyes, and a warm smile. Some have distinctive square glasses and thinner lips. Evidence of potential European ancestry.
hair_description: Medium-length, wavy brown hair, often styled with loose curls or waves. Color varies from reddish brown to dark brown.
body_description: Appears to be of average height with a slender to average build.
